item.title: FBI arrests judge in escalation of Trump immigration enforcement effort
item.description: Federal agents arrested Milwaukee Circuit Court Judge Hannah Dugan on obstruction charges, FBI Director Kash Patel said.

item.title: Former Rep. George Santos set for sentencing in New York federal fraud case
item.description: Santos was expelled from Congress after the Republican was charged with identity theft and submitting false campaign finance reports.

item.title: Russia tests U.S. patience as Trump rushes to clinch Ukraine peace deal in first 100 days in office
item.description: U.S. special envoy Steve Witkoff is expected to carry out further peace talks with Russian President Vladimir Putin on Friday.

item.title: Dozen states sue Trump in bid to block new tariffs
item.description: The lawsuit in the U.S. Court of International Trade argues that Trump cannot use the International Emergency Economic Powers Act to impose tariffs.

item.title: Congress Republicans seek $27 billion for 'Golden Dome' missile defense shield in Trump tax bill: Reuters
item.description: Republicans in Congress plan to introduce a defense package that will give an initial $27 billion boost to a missile defense shield, according to a do...
